data.title: Heads' Strategic Leadership Meeting
data.text:
Six meetings per year for Head teachers on National and Local updates and priorities. A chance to network with other Head teachers at a cost of Â£32 per place per meeting.

We will require places to be pre-booked so that we can ensure the meeting is meeting the minimum number required to make it financially viable to go ahead and also to allow us to give access to materials on the Schools' Information Portal to those pre-booked schools.

Places can be pre-booked by emailing specialistsupport@derby.gov.uk. Please confirm if you would like to book for all 6 meetings in advance or individually.

Handouts and Presentations

Handouts, presentations and all relevant materials will be available on the Schools' Information Portal to download the day before every heads meeting, as agreed.

Please see attached HSLM welcome pack for information on entrance to the stadium, car parking and wifi etc.

Dates for your diary
